name: convert-docs
description: Convert Markdown documents to Microsoft Word (DOCX) using Pandoc.
author: AgentX

args.name: Folders
args.description: Comma-separated list of folders to convert (default: docs/prd,docs/adr,docs/specs,docs/ux,docs/reviews)

args.name: Template
args.description: Path to a DOCX reference template for styling (optional)
